name: In Vitro 2
description:
NEW VERSION (more advanced) : https://david-birge-cotte.itch.io/evolution-sandbox

In Vitro 2 is a simple Genetic Algorithm.

You can either download the game or play it in browser

What is this ?

Creatures try to catch food in order to survive and multiply. If they don't eat in a certain period of time, they die.

When a creature eats food, it creates a clone of itself with a few random mutations.

Controls :

Right clic & Drag : Move Camera around

ScrollWheel : Zoom in and out

Esc : Quit game (inside the simulation)

Game made by

David Birgé-Cotte (http://david-birge-cotte.com/)

Remi Leblanc (http://rleblanc.fr/)

at

Mozilla Paris for the #DiversityJam with JamShaker and Gamelier

Source code & stuff :

https://github.com/PrTesla/GeneticDiversityJam
